de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.manager

Class AbstractImManager<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.manager.AbstractImManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the managed type (e.g. IMC or IMV)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImManager<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultImcManager, DefaultImvManager

    public abstract class AbstractImManager<T>
extends Object
implements ImManager<T>
    Generic base for an IM(C/V) manager. Especially important for inheritance.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private long idDispensor 
      private Deque<Long> idRecyclingBin 
      private Map<Long,T> imIndex 
      private Map<T,Long> ims

      private ImMessageRouter router 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractImManager(ImMessageRouter router, long maxImId)
      Creates a IM(C/V) manager base with the given message router and a maximum IM(C/V) ID limiting the number of available IDs.

      • initialize

        protected abstract void initialize(long primaryId,
              T im)
                            throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Initializes the given IM(C/V) using the given primary ID. Must be implemented by an extending class and is called at the end of the add() method.
        Parameters:
        primaryId - the primary ID
        im - the IM(C/V)
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if initialization fails

      • terminate

        protected abstract void terminate(long id)
        Terminates the IM(C/V) with the given primary ID. Must be implemented by an extending class and is called, at the beginning of the remove() method.
        Parameters:
        id - the IM(C/V) ID

      • reserveId

        private long reserveId()
                throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Reserves an ID from the ID pool. It has an ID reuse mechanism. IDs from removed IM(C/V) will be cached and newly assigned before a new ID is generated.
        Returns:
        an ID
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if ID reservation fails because no IDs are left
